meanings.definition: Having a strong, pungent flavor that is hot or peppery.
meanings.sent1: The chili was the spiciest dish I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: This salsa is the spiciest I've tried so far.
meanings.sent3: The spiciest salsa made my friend's eyes water!
meanings.sent4: Her spiciest comment left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The spiciest curry burned my tongue for hours.

meanings.sent3: His spiciest joke had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The spiciest moment of the game was when they scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: The spiciest part of the concert was when the band played their new song.
